item.title: a) Scaling Up/Down OID Pods
item.description: Introduction This section describes how to increase or decrease the number of OID pods in the Kubernetes deployment. View existing OID pods By default the oid helm chart deployment starts two pods: oidhost1 and oidhost2. The number of pods started is determined by the replicaCount, which is set to 1 by default. A value of 1 starts the two pods above. To scale up or down the number of OID pods, set replicaCount accordingly.
